author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: lightweight browser version of istanbul coverage with zero npm dependencies
name: istanbul-lite

scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmePackageJsonExport && mkdir -p .tmp && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.tmp/covered.istanbul-lite.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + require('./index.js').instrumentSync(require('fs').readFileSync('./index.js', 'utf8'), process.cwd() + '/index.js'), { mode: 0755 })" && npm_config_file_istanbul='.tmp/covered.istanbul-lite.js' node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shNpmTest test.js
